meanings.sent1: The brabbling children in the backseat were arguing over who gets the window seat.
meanings.sent2: The brabbling neighbors could be heard from across the street.
meanings.sent3: The brabbling siblings were so loud that even the dog covered its ears.
meanings.sent4: The brabbling politicians seemed more interested in bickering than finding solutions.
meanings.sent5: The brabbling group of friends at the park made it hard to enjoy the peaceful afternoon.

meanings.sent1: The brabbling stream flowed gently through the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The brabbling brook provided a soothing background noise.
meanings.sent3: The brabbling wind whispered secrets through the trees.
meanings.sent4: The brabbling rain on the roof created a calming ambiance.
meanings.sent5: The brabbling fountain in the garden added a sense of tranquility to the surroundings.

meanings.sent1: The brabbling between the siblings woke up the entire household.
meanings.sent2: The brabbling at the town hall meeting made it hard to hear the speaker.
meanings.sent3: The brabbling of seagulls over a fish was quite a spectacle.
